35138.summary: Some customers in the Sullvan Heights area of Burnaby are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35138.title: Mar 20 – Burnaby (Sullvan Heights) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
